Reference

All functions

diet_summary()

Diet summaries from the SCAR Southern Ocean Diet and Energetics Database

filter_by_importance()

Filter out diet data below a given importance threshold

filter_by_name() filter_by_predator_name() filter_by_prey_name()

Filter data by predator, prey, or taxon name

replace_by_importance()

Replace diet data entries below a given importance threshold

replace_trace_values()

Replace "trace" values in diet data

so_diet() so_dna_diet() so_isotopes() so_energetics() so_lipids() so_sources()

Load data from the SCAR Southern Ocean Diet and Energetics database

so_doi()

Return the DOI of the SCAR Diet and Energetics Database being used

so_isotope_adjust()

Stable isotope corrections
